hid:
Human readable Unique Identifier

Name + _ + InstCls + _ + InstSer
name: Canonical Name for the Function
owner:
ONLY FOR PythonFunction

The package/module that contains the function
args: The list of arguments to feed into the function.  These must be available keys in the associated Parameter Map.
kwargs:
ONLY FOR PythonFunction

A dictionary of keyword arguments to feed into the function

NOT YET SUPPORTED

name: SFLPRES_L1
description: Scaling function to convert the absolute pressure measurement in psi to dbar.

name: identity
description: Returns the value (identify function).

name: ctd_pracsal
description: Compute the L2 PRACSAL data product from CTD

name: ctd_density
description: Compute the L2 DENSITY data product from CTD instruments

name: adcp_beam_eastward
description: Compute the L1 VELPROF-VLE data product from ADCPs configured to output their data in Beam Coordinates.

name: adcp_beam_northward
description: Compute the L1 VELPROF-VLN data product from ADCPs configured to output their data in Beam Coordinates.

name: adcp_beam_vertical
description: Compute the L1 VELPROF-VLU data product from ADCPs configured to output their data in Beam Coordinates.

name: adcp_beam_error
description: Compute the L1 VELPROF-ERR data product from ADCPs configured to output their data in Beam Coordinates.

name: ctd_sbe16plus_tempwat
description: Compute the L1 TEMPWAT data product from the SBE 16Plus V2 CTD instruments

name: ctd_sbe16plus_preswat
description: Compute the L1 PRESWAT data product from the SBE 16Plus V2 CTD instruments

name: ctd_sbe16plus_condwat
description: Compute the L1 CONDWAT data product from the SBE 16Plus V2 CTD instruments

name: adcp_scaling
description: Applying scaling function to convert L0 VELPROF data from mm/s to the L1 VELPROF in m/s.

name: pco2_abs434_ratio
description: Optical Absorbance Ratio at 434 nm

name: pco2_abs620_ratio
description: Optical Absorbance Ratio at 620 nm

name: pco2_blank
description: Calculates the absorbance blank at 434 or 620 nm from the SAMI2-pCO2 instrument.

name: pco2_thermistor
description: Convert the raw thermistor resistivity from counts to deg_C for use in subsequent pCO2 calculations

name: pco2_pco2wat
description: Compute  the L1 PCO2WAT data product from the SAMI-II pCO2 instruments. NOTE: the following calibration coefficients in the list of arguments are deprecated: "ea434", "eb434", "ea620", "eb620". Those arguments are still present in the function declaration, but they are completely unused and can be supplied with an arbitrary fill value.

name: ph_434_intensity
description: Extract the absorbance signal intensity at 434 nm from the light measurements collected by the SAMI-II pH instrument

name: ph_578_intensity
description: Extract the absorbance signal intensity at 620 nm from the light measurements collected by the SAMI-II pH instrument

name: ph_thermistor
description: Convert the raw thermistor resistivity from counts to deg_C for use in subsequent pH calculations

name: ph_calc_phwater
description: Compute the L2 PHWATER data product from the SAMI-II pH instrument using PRACSAL_L2 from a co-located CTD as an input. A default salinity of 35 can be used.

name: adcp_earth_eastward
description: Scale and apply the magnetic variation correction the eastward velocity component of data collect from ADCPs using the Earth Coordinate transform. Yields VELPROF-VLE_L1 data product

name: adcp_earth_northward
description: Scale and apply the magnetic variation correction the northward velocity component of data collect from ADCPs using the Earth Coordinate transform. Yields VELPROF-VLN_L1 data product

name: opt_beam_attenuation
description: Compute the beam attenuation coefficient (OPTATTN_L2) from raw OPTAA instrument output and instrument specific calibration files.

name: opt_optical_absorption
description: Compute the optical absorption coefficient (OPTABSN_L2) from raw OPTAA instrument output and instrument specific calibration files.

name: nobska_mag_corr_east
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLE (Nobska) by correcting L0 for compass declination and converting from cm/s to m/s.

name: nobska_mag_corr_north
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLN (Nobska) by correcting L0 for compass declination and converting from cm/s to m/s.

name: nortek_mag_corr_east
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLE (Nortek Vector) or L1 VELPTMN-VLE (Nortek Aquadopp) by correcting theL0 for compass declination.  Output in m/s.

name: nortek_mag_corr_north
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLN (Nortek Vector) or L1 VELPTMN-VLN (Nortek Aquadopp) by correcting theL0 for compass declination.  Output in m/s.

name: nobska_scale_up_vel
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLU (Nobska) by converting L0 from cm/s to m/s.

name: nortek_up_vel
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLU (Nortek Vecotor) or L1 VELPTMN-VLU (Nortek Aquadopp) no algorithm needed.

name: do2_SVU
description: The Stern-Volmer-Uchida equation that converts phase into temperature corrected dissolved oxygen L1 DOCONCS

name: o2_counts_to_uM
description: L1 DOCONCS from a CTDBP linked DOSTA, converts counts to umol/L

name: do2_salinity_correction
description: Salinity and pressure correction to dissolved oxygen producing L2 DOCONCS

name: sfl_trhph_reftemp
description: TRHPH thermistor reference temperature

name: sfl_trhph_vfltemp
description: L1 TRHPHTE, Vent Fluid Temperature from the TRHPH instrument class.

name: sfl_trhph_chloride
description: L2 TRHPHCC, Vent Fluid Chloride Concentration from the TRHPH instrument class.

name: sfl_trhph_vflorp
description: L1 TRHPHEH, Vent Fluid Oxidation-Reduction Potential (ORP) from the TRHPH instrument class.

name: partial_pressure_co2
description: Partial Pressure of CO2 in the atmosphere (PCO2ATM_L1) or the surface seawater (PCO2SSW_L1).

name: mbar_2_pa
description: convert L0 barometric pressure BARPRES in millibars(mbar) to Pascals (Pa) to produce L1 BARPRES

name: prs_bottilt_ccmp
description: Correct the sensor compass direction from the Applied Geomechanics LILY tilt sensor, accounting for magentic declination and individual sensor idiosyncracies.

name: prs_bottilt_tmag
description: Calculate the tilt magnitude for BOTPT Seafloor Pressure instruments.

name: prs_bottilt_tdir
description: Calculate the tilt direction for the BOTPT Seafloor Pressure instruments.

name: scale_and_offset
description: Converts a value, X, using a scaling factor (sf) and offset (off)

name: par_satlantic
description: Calculates the L1 OPTPARW from the Satlantic instrument on the RSN Shallow Profiler.

name: par_biospherical
description: Calculate the L1 OPTPARW from the Biospherical QSP-2100 series of scalar instruments.

name: c_to_f
description: Converts units from deg_C to deg_F

name: flo_bback_total
description: Calculates the total optical backscatter in m^-1 (FLUBSCT-BBACK_L1) from the WET Labs ECO Triplet instruments.

name: flo_cdom
description: Estimates the CDOM concentration in ppb (L1 CDOMFLO) from the WET Labs ECO Triplet instruments.

name: flo_chla
description: Estimates the Chlorophyll a concentration in ug/L (L1 CHLAFLO) from the WET Labs ECO Triplet instruments.

name: flo_beta
description: Calculates the volume scattering of seawater in m^-1 sr^-1 (FLUBSCT-BETA_L1) from the WET Labs ECO Triplet instruments.

name: opt_par_biospherical_wfp
description: Calculate the L1 OPTPARW from the Biospherical QSP-2100 series of scalar instruments on the McLane Moored Profiler.

name: opt_par_satlantic
description: Calculates the L1 OPTPARW from Satlantic PAR instruments.

name: ctd_sbe52mp_condwat
description: Compute the L1 CONDWAT data product from the SBE 52MP CTD instrument on the profiling platforms.

name: ctd_sbe52mp_tempwat
description: Compute the L1 TEMPWAT data product from the SBE 52MP CTD instrument on the profiling platforms.

name: ctd_sbe52mp_preswat
description: Compute the L1 PRESWAT data product from the SBE 52MP CTD instrument on the profiling platforms.

name: do2_dofst_volt
description: Takes a voltage measured from a DOFST-A (SBE 43F) Oxygen sensor connected to a CTDBP (SBE 16+ V2) profiling CTD, and converts the frequency to dissolved oxygen in units of micromoles/kg for the OOI level 2 data product DOCONCF L2 (fast response oxygen) in combination with salinity, temperature, and pressure from the CTD

name: do2_dofst_frequency
description: Takes a frequency measured from a DOFST-K (SBE 43F) Oxygen sensor connected to a CTDPF-CKL (SBE 52-MP) profiling CTD, and converts the frequency to dissolved oxygen in units of micromoles/kg for the OOI level 2 data product DOCONCF L2 (fast response oxygen) in combination with salinity, temperature, and pressure from the CTD

name: adcp_backscatter
description: Calculate the ECHOINT L1 data product for all RDI Workhorse ADCPs and ExplorerDVLs.

name: opt_par_biospherical_mobile
description: Calculate the L1 OPTPARW from the Biospherical QSP-2155 series of scalar instruments on the TWR Slocum Gliders.

name: vel3dk_east
description: Transforms beam velocities to Earth coordinate velocities and then corrects for magnetic declination to produce the true Earth frame eastward velocity as the L1 VELPTTU-VLE OOI data product.

name: vel3dk_north
description: Transforms beam velocities to Earth coordinate velocities and then corrects for magnetic declination to produce the true Earth frame northward velocity as the L1 VELPTTU-VLN OOI data product.

name: vel3dk_up
description: Takes an integer vertical velocity in generic distance per second units from a VEL3D-K (Aquadopp II on a McLane Profiler(MMP)) with the provided Vscale parameter from an MMP A#####.DEC binary data file to scale the velocity to a floating point in m/s.

name: pco2_co2flux
description: Compute the L2 CO2FLUX data product from the L1 PCO2ATM and PCO2SSW data products from the Pro-Oceanus pCO2 sensor with sea-surface temperature and salinity and average wind speed at 10 m as additional inputs.

name: opt_ocr507_irradiance
description: Compute the L1 SPECTIR data product from the Satlantic OCR-507 family of spectral irradiance sensors.

name: ctd_sbe16digi_preswat
description: Compute the L1 PRESWAT data product from the SBE 16Plus V2 CTD instruments

name: flo_scat_seawater
description: Computes the total scattering coefficient of seawater, used in the computation of the FLUBSCT-BBACK_L1 data product and required as an additional metadata product with the FLUBSCT data product.

name: ph_battery
description: Converts the raw measured battery voltage from counts to volts for the PHSEN.

name: sfl_thsph_temp_th
description: OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-TH (final temperature at position H near sample inlet), which is calculated using data from the Hydrothermal Vent Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument, series A (one series for all instruments).

name: sfl_thsph_temp_tl
description:
OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-TL (final temperature at position
        L near vent), which is calculated using data from the Hydrothermal Vent
        Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument, series A (one series for all
        instruments).

name: sfl_thsph_temp_tch
description:
OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-TCH (intermediate thermocouple
        temperature at position H), which is calculated using data from the
        Hydrothermal Vent Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument, series A
        (one series for all instruments).

name: sfl_thsph_temp_tcl
description:
OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-TCL (intermediate thermocouple
        temperature at position L), which is calculated using data from the
        Hydrothermal Vent Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument, series A
        (one series for all instruments).

name: sfl_thsph_temp_int
description: OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-INT (internal board thermistor temperature), which is calculated using data from the Hydrothermal Vent Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument

name: sfl_thsph_temp_ref
description:
OOI Level 1 THSPH data product THSPHTE-REF (reference thermistor
        temperature), which is calculated using data from the Hydrothermal
        Vent Fluid In-situ Chemistry (THSPH) instrument, series A (one series
        for all instruments).

name: velpt_mag_corr_north
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLN (Nortek Vector) or L1 VELPTMN-VLN (Nortek Aquadopp) by correcting theL0 for compass declination. Output in m/s.

name: velpt_mag_corr_east
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLE (Nortek Vector) or L1 VELPTMN-VLE (Nortek Aquadopp) by correcting theL0 for compass declination. Output in m/s.

name: velpt_up_vel
description: L1 VELPTTU-VLU (Nortek Vecotor) or L1 VELPTMN-VLU (Nortek Aquadopp) no algorithm needed.

name: sfl_trhph_vfl_thermistor_temp
description:
Calculates T_S, which is an intermediate data product (not a core data
        product) requested by the authors of the TRHPHTE DPS. It is the
        instrument's thermistor temperature, useful as an important instrument
        diagnostic. It is the same variable as T_ts in the function
        sfl_trhph_vfltemp.

name: ts_corrected_nitrate
description: The OOI Level 2 Dissolved Nitrate Concentration, Temperature & Salinity Corrected core data product (L2 NITRTSC) is based on the ultraviolet (UV) absorption characteristics of nitrate dissolved in seawater. The L2 NITRTSC is produced from the L0 NITROPT output of the NUTNR instrument class and the L1 Water Temperature (TEMPWAT) and L2 Practical Salinity (PRACSAL) core data products from a co-located Conductivity, Temperature, and Depth (CTD) instrument. The L2 NITRTSC core data product improves upon accuracy of onboard L1 NITRDIS through corrections for both seawater absorbance and its temperature dependence

name: sfl_thsph_ph
description:
Calculates the THSPHPH-PH_L2 data product, one of the 4 THSPHPH data
        products for the THSPH instruments. The PH data product algorithm
        calculates pH assuming good chloride data is available from
        TRHPH (TRHPHCC_L2) and a working AgCl reference electrode.

name: sfl_thsph_ph_acl
description:
Calculates the THSPHPH-PH-ACL_L2 data product, one of the 4 THSPHPH
        data products for the THSPH instruments. The PH-ACL data product
        algorithm calculates pH assuming no good chloride data available from
        TRHPH (TRHPHCC_L2) (assumes instead a pre-determined chloride concentration
        which is set in the chloride_activity function). The data from the AgCl
        reference electrode is also assumed to be good and used in this
        calculation.

name: sfl_thsph_ph_noref
description:
Calculates the THSPHPH-PH-NOREF_L2 data product, one of the 4 THSPHPH
        data products for the THSPH instruments. The PH-NOREF data product
        algorithm calculates pH assuming no good reference (AgCl) electrode data
        (uses instead a theoretical value calculated from vent temperature) and
        also uses (presumably good) chloride data from TRHPH (TRHPHCC_L2).

name: sfl_thsph_ph_noref_acl
description:
Calculates the THSPHPH-PH-NOREF-ACL_L2 data product, one of the 4 THSPHPH
        data products for the THSPH instruments. The PH-NOREF-ACL data product
        algorithm calculates pH assuming no good reference (AgCl) electrode data
        (uses instead a theoretical value calculated from vent temperature) and
        assuming no good chloride data from TRHPH (TRHPHCC_L2) (assumes instead a
        pre-determined chloride concentration which is set in the chloride_activity
        function).

name: sfl_thsph_sulfide
description:
Calculates the THSPHHS_L2 data product (hydrogen sulfide concentration) for
        the THSPH instruments from vent temperature and from data from its sulfide
        and YSZ electrodes. Note that the chemical formula for hydrogen is H2, and
        that for hydrogen sulfide is H2S; this could lead to confusion in the
        variable and array names from the DPS if care is not taken. Note also that
        this hydrogen sulfide DPA does use an intermediate data product and its
        'calibration' coefficients (hydrogen fugacity) that are also used in the
        hydrogen concentration DPA.

name: sfl_thsph_hydrogen
description:
Calculates the THSPHHC_L2 data product (hydrogen concentration) for the THSPH
        instruments from vent temperature and from data from its hydrogen and YSZ
        electrodes.

name: hyd_bb_acoustic_pwaves
description:
Calculates the OOI Level 1 (L1) Broadband Acoustic Pressure Waves core
        data product (HYDAPBB)

name: hyd_lf_acoustic_pwaves
description: Calculates the HYDAPLF_L1 data product (low frequency acoustic pressure wave) from the HYDBB instrument using the HYDAPLF_L0 as input.

name: obs_bb_ground_velocity
description: Calculates the GRNDVEL_L1 data product (broadband ground velocity) from the OBSBB instrument using the GRNDVEL_L0 as input.

name: obs_bb_ground_acceleration
description: Calculates the GRNDACC_L1 data product (broadband ground acceleration) from the OBSBB instrument using the GRNDACC_L0 as input.

name: obs_sp_ground_velocity
description: Calculates the SGRDVEL_L1 data product (short period ground velocity) from the OBSSP instrument using the SGRDVEL_L0 as input.

name: vadcp_beam_eastward
description: Calculates the VELTURB-VLE_L1 data product (eastward seawater velocity) in m/s from the VADCP instrument.

name: vadcp_beam_northward
description: Calculates the VELTURB-VLN_L1 data product (northward seawater velocity) in m/s from the VADCP instrument.

name: vadcp_beam_vertical_est
description: Calculates the VELTURB-VLU_L1 data product (estimated vertical seawater velocity) in m/s from the VADCP instrument.

name: vadcp_beam_vertical_true
description: Calculates the VELTURB-W5_L1 data product (true vertical seawater velocity) in m/s from the VADCP instrument.

name: vadcp_beam_error
description: Calculates the VELTURB-EVL_L1 data product (error velocity) in m/s from the VADCP instrument.

name: adcp_beam2ins
description: This function converts the Beam Coordinate transformed velocity profiles to the instrument coordinate system. The calculations are defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: adcp_ins2earth
description: This function converts the Instrument Coordinate transformed velocity profiles to the Earth coordinate system. The calculation is defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: adcp_earth_upward
description: Wrapper function to compute the Upward Velocity Profile (VELPROF-VLU) from Earth coordinate transformed velocity profiles as defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: adcp_earth_error_velocity
description: Wrapper function to compute the Error Velocity Profile (VELPROF-ERR) from Earth coordinate transformed velocity profiles as defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: sfl_sflpres_rtime
description: Scaling function to convert the absolute pressure measurement in psi to dbar. Used to compute SFLPRES-RTIME_L1.

name: sfl_sflpres_tide
description: Used to compute SFLPRES-TIDE_L1.

name: sfl_sflpres_wave
description: Used to compute SFLPRES-WAVE_L1.

name: wav_triaxys_dir_freq
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-FDS_L1 data product (frequency values for directional wave spectral bins) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies).

name: wav_triaxys_nondir_freq
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-FND_L1 data product (frequency values for non-directional wave spectral bins) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies).

name: wav_triaxys_buoymotion_time
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-MOTT_L1 data product (time values associated with buoy displacement measurements WAVSTAT-MOT[X,Y,Z]) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies).

name: wav_triaxys_correct_mean_wave_direction
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-D_L2 data product (mean wave direction corrected for magnetic declination) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies).

name: wav_triaxys_correct_directional_wave_direction
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-DDS_L2 data product (directional wave directions corrected for magnetic declination) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies).

name: wav_triaxys_magcor_buoymotion_x
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-MOTX_L1 data product (eastward buoy displacement) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies) from the WAVSTAT-MOTX_L0 and WAVSTAT-MOTY_L0 data products. All that is required is to correct for magnetic declination (variation).

name: wav_triaxys_magcor_buoymotion_y
description: Function to compute the WAVSTAT-MOTY_L1 data product (northward buoy displacement) for the WAVSS instrument class (TRIAXYS Wave Sensor, manufactured by AXYS Technologies) from the WAVSTAT-MOTX_L0 and WAVSTAT-MOTY_L0 data products. All that is required is to correct for magnetic declination (variation).

name: BARPRES_L1
description: OOI Level 1 Barometric Pressure core data product, which is calculated by scaling the measured barometric pressure from mbar to Pascals.

name: WINDAVG-VLE_L1
description: Calculates WINDAVG-VLE_L1, the OOI Level 1 core data product for windspeed in the true eastward direction, for the METBK instrument by correcting for magnetic declination.

name: WINDAVG-VLN_L1
description: Calculates WINDAVG-VLN_L1, the OOI Level 1 core data product for windspeed in the true northward direction, for the METBK instrument by correcting for magnetic declination.

name: CURRENT_DIR
description: Calculates the direction of the surface current using the eastward and northward velocity components from the VELPT mounted on the surface buoy.

name: CURRENT_SPD
description: Estimate the magnitude of the surface current using the eastward and northward velocity components from the VELPT mounted on the surface buoy. This is the meta-data "product" CURRENT specified by the DPS referenced below (Section 4.3, step 4). This product is not used in the METBK code; rather, the magnitude of the vector difference of te wind and current vectors is the fundamental variable used in the METBK calculations (see RELWIND_SPD-AUX). Because the direction of the current will also be calculated so as to be made available, the CURRENT metadata product is sub-divided into: CURRENT_SPD (calculated by this code) and CURRENT_DIR.

name: RELWIND_DIR-AUX
description: Calculates RELWIND_DIR-AUX, the direction of the vector difference of wind velocity (from METBK measurements) and surface current (from VELPT measurements). It is anticipated that the wind measurements will be roughly each minute and that the current measurements will be broadcast to that resolution.

name: RELWIND_SPD-AUX
description: Calculates RELWIND_SPD-AUX, the magnitude of the vector difference of surface current (from VELPT measurements) from wind velocity (from METBK measurements). This is the fundamental windspeed variable used in the METBK toga-coare algorithms. It is anticipated that the wind measurements will be roughly each minute and that the current measurements will be broadcast to that resolution.

name: TIMEFLX-AUX
description: Calculates TIMEFLX-AUX, the timestamps corresponding to the hourly averaged METBK data products. The units of the timestamps are seconds since 01-01-1900. The timestamp values are selected to be at the midpoint of the bin intervals, starting half an hour after the timestamp of the first data record to be processed. For example, if the first data record for 30 days of data is at 4:45 AM on a given day, the first timeflx stamp will be at 5:15 AM on that day, and all succeeding timestamps for the rest of the data will all be at 15 minutes past the hour.

name: NETSIRR_L2
description: Calculates NETSIRR_L2, the OOI core data product net shortwave radiation in the downward direction, for the METBK instrument. This data product may have been misclassified (it looks like L1).

name: RAINRTE_L2
description: Calculates RAINRTE_L2 (probably really an L1 product), the OOI core data product rain rate, for the METBK instrument. The DPS requires that the output data be hourly; METBK is set up to give roughly one data record per minute for the data needed to calculate RAINRTE.

name: SALSURF_L2
description: OOI Level 2 Sea Surface Salinity core data product, which is calculated using the Thermodynamic Equations of Seawater - 2010 (TEOS-10) Version 3.0, with data from the conductivity, temperature and depth (CTD) family of instruments.

name: SPECHUM_L2
description: Calculates SPECHUM_L2, the OOI air specific humidity core data product, for the METBK instrument. Not to be confused with the SPHUM2M_L2 data product.

name: BUOYFLS_L2
description: Calculates the sonic buoyancy flux (proposed) data product BUOYFLS_L2 using the sonic temperature instead of the virtual temperature. The FDCHP instrument calculates the analogous FLUXHOT_L2 data product also as a buoyancy flux using the sonic temperature. In contrast, the (METBK) proposed data product BUOYFLX_L2 uses the virtual temperature in its calculation of buoyancy flux.

name: BUOYFLX_L2
description: Calculates the buoyancy flux (proposed) data product BUOYFLX_L2 using the virtual temperature. This is the more fundamental quantity for buoyancy flux (rather than using the sonic temperature).

name: FRSHFLX_L2
description: Calculates the freshwater upward flux data product FRSHFLX_L2.

name: HEATFLX_L2
description: Calculates the total net upward heat flux data product HEATFLX_L2.

name: LATNFLX_L2
description: Calculates the upward latent heat flux data product LATNFLX_L2.

name: MOMMFLX_L2
description: Calculates (the absolute value of) the momentum flux MOMMFLX_L2, also called the wind stress tau.

name: NETLIRR_L2
description: Calculates the net upward longwave irradiance NETLIRR_L2.

name: RAINFLX_L2
description: Calculates the net upward rain heat flux RAINFLX_L2. A new derivation for rain heat flux is used, as calculated in the subroutine rain_heat_flux.

name: SENSFLX_L2
description: Calculates the net upward sensible heat flux SENSFLX_L2.

name: SPHUM2M_L2
description: Calculates the modelled specific humidity at a reference height of 2m SPHUM2M_L2.

name: STABLTY_L2
description: Calculates the Monin-Obukhov stability parameter metadata product STABLTY_L2.

name: TEMPA2M_L2
description: Calculates the modelled air temperature at a reference height of 2m TEMPA2M_L2.

name: TEMPSKN_L2
description: Calculates the skin sea temperature based on the warmlayer and coolskin (coare35vn) model: metadata product TEMPSKN_L2.

name: WIND10M_L2
description: Calculates the modelled windspeed at a reference height of 10m WIND10M_L2.

name: VELPTMN-VLE_L1
description: Function to compute the Eastward Velocity L1 VELPTMN-VLE in True Earth coordinates

name: VELPTMN-VLN_L1
description: Function to compute the Northward Velocity L1 VELPTMN-VLN in True Earth coordinates

name: VELPTMN-VLU_L1
description: Function to compute the Upward Velocity L1 VELPTMN-VLU

name: opt_par_wetlabs
description: Calculates the L1 OPTPARW from Wet Labs PAR instruments.

name: fsi_acm_rsn_east
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series A eastwards velocity data product VELPTMN-VLE_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler as deployed by RSN. The horizontal velocities are corrected for magnetic declination.

name: fsi_acm_rsn_north
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series A northwards velocity data product VELPTMN-VLN_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler as deployed by RSN. The horizontal velocities are corrected for magnetic declination.

name: fsi_acm_sio_east
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series L eastwards velocity data product VELPTMN-VLE_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler as deployed by Scripps. Horizontal velocities are corrected for magnetic variation.

name: fsi_acm_sio_north
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series L northwards velocity data product VELPTMN-VLN_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler as deployed by Scripps. Horizontal velocities are corrected for magnetic variation.

name: fsi_acm_up_profiler_ascending
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series A and L upward velocity data product VELPTMN-VLU-ASC_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler.

name: fsi_acm_up_profiler_descending
description: Calculates the VEL3D Series A and L upwards velocity data product VELPTMN-VLU-DSC_L1 for the Falmouth Scientific (FSI) Acoustic Current Meter (ACM) mounted on a McLane profiler.

name: prs_botsflu_time15s
description: Calculates the auxiliary BOTSFLU data product TIME15S-AUX. These are timestamps anchored at multiples of 15 seconds past the minute which correspond to the time base for the BOTSFLU data products which are binned on 15 seconds.

name: prs_botsflu_meanpres
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product MEANPRES_L1.

name: prs_botsflu_meandepth
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product MEANDEPTH_L2, de-tided bottom depth as a function of time (15sec bins).

name: prs_botsflu_5minrate
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product 5MINRATE_L2, the instantaneous rate of depth change using 5 minute backwards-looking meandepth data.

name: prs_botsflu_10minrate
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product 10MINRATE_L2, the mean seafloor uplift rate calculated using 10 minute backwards-looking 10 minute running mean depth data.

name: prs_botsflu_time24h
description: Calculates the auxiliary BOTSFLU data product TIME24H-AUX. These are timestamps anchored at midnight which correspond to the time base for the BOTSFLU data products which are binned on a day's worth of data.

name: prs_botsflu_daydepth_from_15s_meandepth
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product DAYDEPTH_L2, de-tided bottom depth as a function of time (1 day bins).

name: prs_botsflu_4wkrate_from_daydepth
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product 4WKRATE_L2, the mean rate of seafloor change as calculated by 4-week backwards-looking linear regressions.

name: prs_botsflu_8wkrate_from_daydepth
description: Calculates the BOTSFLU data product 8WKRATE_L2, the mean rate of seafloor change as calculated by 8-week backwards-looking linear regressions.

name: prs_botsflu_predtide
description: Assigns tide values for the 3 BOTPT instrument sites about 500 km west of Astoria. When the input argument is the data product TIME15S, the output of this function will be the BOTSFLU data product BOTSFLU-PREDTIDE_L2.

name: scale_it
description: Scale the value.

name: fdc_tmpatur
description: Calculates the L1 temperature data product TMPATUR_L1 from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. The L1 data consists of these values less 30 seconds from both the beginning and end of each 12000 point dataset.

name: fdc_windtur_north
description: Calculates the L1 windspeed data product WINDTUR-VLN_L1 from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. The L1 data consists of these values less 30 seconds from both the beginning and end of each 12000 point dataset.

name: fdc_windtur_up
description: Calculates the L1 windspeed data product WINDTUR-VLU_L1 from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. The L1 data consists of these values less 30 seconds from both the beginning and end of each 12000 point dataset.

name: fdc_windtur_west
description: Calculates the L1 windspeed data product WINDTUR-VLW_L1 from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. The L1 data consists of these values less 30 seconds from both the beginning and end of each 12000 point dataset.

name: fdc_fluxhot
description: Calculates FLUXHOT_L2, the sonic buoyancy flux, from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. There is one FLUXHOT value calculated for each 20 minute dataset of 12000 data records.

name: fdc_fluxmom_alongwind
description: Calculates FLUXMOM-U_L2, the along-wind component of the momentum flux, from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. There is one FLUXMOM-U_L2 value calculated for each 20 minute dataset of 12000 data records.

name: fdc_fluxmom_crosswind
description: Calculates FLUXMOM-V_L2, the cross-wind component of the momentum flux, from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. There is one FLUXMOM-V_L2 value calculated for each 20 minute dataset of 12000 data records.

name: fdc_time_L1
description: Calculates the time metadata product TIME_L1-AUX associated with the L1 wind and temperature data products from the FDCHP instrument, which collects 20 minutes of data every hour. For each of the L1 data products, 30 seconds of data is stripped out from the beginning and end of each 20 minute, 12000 record dataset. The TIME_L1-AUX values are the remaining timestamps for each dataset.

name: fdc_time_L2
description: Calculates the time metadata product TIME_L2-AUX associated with the L2 flux data products from the FDCHP instrument. FDCHP collects 20 minutes of data every hour; for each of the L2 flux data products, one data value is calculated for each 20 minute dataset. The TIME_L2-AUX values are the median timestamps for each dataset.

name: dosta_Topt_volt_to_degC
description: Computes T_optode [degC], the DOSTA foil temperature as measured by its internal thermistor, from the analog output of a DOSTA Aanderaa Optode connected to a SBE CTD's 0-5 volt analog data channel.

name: dosta_phase_volt_to_degree
description: Computes the DOCONCS-DEG_L0 data product from DOCONCS-VLT_L0, the analog output of a DOSTA Aanderaa Optode connected to a SBE CTD's 0-5 volt analog data channel.

name: adcp_bin_depths_dapa
description: Calculates the center bin depths for PD0 and PD12 ADCP data. As defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: adcp_bin_depths_bar
description: Calculates the center bin depths for PD0 and PD12 ADCP data. As defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: adcp_bin_depths_pd8
description: Calculates the center bin depths for PD8 ADCP data. As defined in the Data Product Specification for Velocity Profile and Echo Intensity - DCN 1341-00750.

name: sci_water_pressure_dbar
description: Scale pressure from bar to dbar.

name: ctd_sbe37im_preswat_instrument_recovered
description: Compute the L1 PRESWAT data product from the SBE37IM CTD instruments

name: ctd_sbe37im_tempwat_instrument_recovered
description: Compute the L1 TEMPWAT data product from the SBE37IM CTD instruments

name: ctd_sbe37im_condwat_instrument_recovered
description: Compute the L1 CONDWAT data product from the SBE37IM CTD instruments

name: sfl_sbe26plus_prestmp
description: Compute the temperature near the sensor of the PRESF instruments.

name: ctdbp_counts_to_volts
description: Computes the voltage from the A/D count value from the CTDBP voltage measurements.

name: NETSIRR_HOURLY_L2
description: Calculates NETSIRR_HOURLY_L2, the OOI core data product net shortwave radiation in the downward direction, for the METBK instrument. This data product may have been misclassified (it looks like L1).

name: HEATFLX_MINUTE_L2
description: Calculates the total net upward heat flux data product HEATFLX_MINUTE_L2.

name: LATNFLX_MINUTE_L2
description: Calculates the upward latent heat flux data product LATNFLX_MINUTE_L2.

name: NETLIRR_MINUTE_L2
description: Calculates the net upward longwave irradiance NETLIRR_MINUTE_L2.

name: SENSFLX_MINUTE_L2
description: Calculates the net upward sensible heat flux SENSFLX_MINUTE_L2.

name: enumerate
description: Returns an array of indexes based on the number of data items in a single observation of data.

name: select_non_zero_arg
description: Select a non-zero arg.

name: depth_from_pressure_dbar
description: Calculates depth from pressure in decibar (dbar)

name: select_arg_within_tolerance_of_std
description: Select arg within tolerance of std.

name: pco2_battery
description: Converts the raw measured battery voltage from counts to volts for the PCO2.

name: plims_a_hdr_science_look_time
description: Cumulative time spent capturing images during sampling period

name: plims_a_hdr_science_flow_rate
description: Flow rate calculated from sample volume per syringe sampling speed

name: plims_a_hdr_science_volume_analyzed
description: Volume of sample analyzed during the RunTime

name: plims_a_hdr_science_rois_per_ml
description: The number of ROIs recorded per mL of sample volume analyzed
